FlavorSettings.GameFlavorText: You can use the four arrows to move North, South, East, and West. You may encounter enemies, find treasure, or discover secrets. If you encounter an enemy, you will be taken into another menu for the combat phase. Explore, fight, and gain power; it is all that will keep you alive.

Class.Name: Soldier
Class.ClassDescription: A light melee focused class. Dodges easily, but does little damage.

Class.Name: Knight
Class.ClassDescription: A medium melee focused class. Dodges with difficulty, but does good damage.

Class.Name: Archer
Class.ClassDescription: An archery focused class. Dodges extremely easily, but does very little damage.

Class.Name: Giant
Class.ClassDescription: A very heavy melee focused class. Almost never dodges, but does lots of damage.
